entities.name: gryffindor team
entities.description: The text describes the Gryffindor team as a group of students who are part of the Gryffindor house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. They are mentioned as landing beside the wreckage of wood under which Zacharias was feebly stirring.

entities.name: zacharias
entities.description: Zacharias is a person who is mentioned as being underneath the wreckage of wood that the Gryffindor team landed on. He is described as 'feebly stirring', suggesting that he may be injured.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is mentioned as being part of the Gryffindor team and as having hugged Ginny in celebration. He is described as 'laughing' and 'breaking free of the rest of the team'.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person who is mentioned as being part of the Gryffindor team and as having hugged Harry in celebration. She is described as 'blithely' saying sorry to Professor McGonagall for forgetting to brake.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a person who is mentioned as being an irate professor. Ginny says sorry to her for forgetting to brake.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is mentioned as being part of the Gryffindor team and as having been hugged by Harry in celebration. He is described as 'laughing' and 'clapping a cheering Ron on the back'.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a person who is mentioned as saying 'Party up in the common room!' to encourage his teammates.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a person who is mentioned as yelling 'Câ€™mon, Ginny , Demelza!' to encourage his teammates.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is mentioned as entering the changing room and looking upset but determined. She is described as 'twisting her Gryffindor scarf in her hands'.

relationships.description: Ron clapped Harry on the back to congratulate him.
Seamus encouraged his teammates by saying 'Party up in the common room!'
Dean called out to Ginny and Demelza to encourage them.
Hermione entered the changing room where her teammates were celebrating.
